mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.product_id, c.product_price, c.product_cnt, p.itemNm, p.img FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, product_id, product_price, product_cnt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{productPrice}, #{productCnt});
